languages.text: Кто-то бережно отполировал обломки эльдарских винтовок и пиломечей. К каждой детали прикреплена бирка с личным номером.

traits.locale_text: Кто-то бережно отполировал обломки эльдарских винтовок и пиломечей. К каждой детали прикреплена бирка с личным номером.

languages.text: Somebody carefully polished shards of Aeldari rifles and chainswords. There is a label with an individual number attached to every piece.
languages.original_text: Кто-то бережно отполировал обломки эльдарских винтовок и пиломечей. К каждой детали прикреплена бирка с личным номером.

traits.locale_text: Somebody carefully polished shards of Aeldari rifles and chainswords. There is a label with an individual number attached to every piece.
Somebody carefully polished the shards of Aeldari rifles and chainswords. There is a tag with a personal number attached to every piece.

Somebody carefully polished shards of Aeldari rifles and chainswords. There is a label with an individual number attached to every piece.

languages.text: 何者かがアエルダリのライフルやチェーンソードの破片を丁寧に磨いていたようだ。すべてのパーツに個別番号が書かれたラベルが貼られている。
languages.original_text: Somebody carefully polished shards of Aeldari rifles and chainswords. There is a label with an individual number attached to every piece.

traits.locale_text: 何者かがアエルダリのライフルやチェーンソードの破片を丁寧に磨いていたようだ。すべてのパーツに個別番号が書かれたラベルが貼られている。

languages.text: Alguien ha pulido cuidadosamente fragmentos de rifles y espadas sierra Aeldari. Cada pieza tiene una etiqueta con un número.
languages.original_text: Somebody carefully polished shards of Aeldari rifles and chainswords. There is a label with an individual number attached to every piece.

traits.locale_text: Alguien ha pulido cuidadosamente fragmentos de rifles y espadas sierra Aeldari. Cada pieza tiene una etiqueta con un número.

languages.text: 这些艾达灵族的步枪与链锯剑部件被人精心擦拭过，每件物品上都贴着带有唯一编号的标签。
languages.original_text: Somebody carefully polished shards of Aeldari rifles and chainswords. There is a label with an individual number attached to every piece.

traits.locale_text: 这些艾达灵族的步枪与链锯剑部件被人精心擦拭过，每件物品上都贴着带有唯一编号的标签。

languages.text: Quelqu'un a entretenu avec soin les fragments d'armes à feu et d'épées tronçonneuses aeldaris. Chaque élément dispose d'une étiquette numérotée.
languages.original_text: Somebody carefully polished shards of Aeldari rifles and chainswords. There is a label with an individual number attached to every piece.

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un a entretenu avec soin les fragments d'armes à feu et d'épées tronçonneuses aeldaris. Chaque élément dispose d'une étiquette numérotée.

languages.text: Jemand hat Teile von Aeldari-Gewehren und -Kettenschwertern sorgfältig poliert. Jedes Stück ist mit einem Etikett versehen, auf dem eine Nummerierung steht.
languages.original_text: Somebody carefully polished shards of Aeldari rifles and chainswords. There is a label with an individual number attached to every piece.

traits.locale_text: Jemand hat Teile von Aeldari-Gewehren und -Kettenschwertern sorgfältig poliert. Jedes Stück ist mit einem Etikett versehen, auf dem eine Nummerierung steht.

languages.text: Birileri Aeldari tüfekleriyle motorlu kılıçlarının parçalarını dikkatlice cilalamış. Parçaların her birine iliştirilen etiketlerde sayıları teker teker yazılmış.
languages.original_text: Somebody carefully polished shards of Aeldari rifles and chainswords. There is a label with an individual number attached to every piece.
